name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT HX [Base64 Encoded - Registry Value]
description: This rule looks for Base64 Encoded Strings observed at registry values identified by HX IOC regkey events generated by Trellix Endpoint Security (HX). Adversaries may use this method to bypass the detections, and it is advised to check the legitimacy of the activity.
tags: Trellix,HX,Registry,Trellix Endpoint,Defense Evasion,Obfuscated Files or Information,T1027,Modify Registry,T1112,md-info

name: TRELLIX HX [Mal Hit Found]
description: This rule looks for Mal (Malware Detection) events generated by Trellix Endpoint Security (HX) logs.
query: class=fireeye_hx action=`detection mal hit` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: TRELLIX HX [IOC Hit Found]
description: This rule looks for IOC detection events generated by Trellix Endpoint Security (HX) logs.
query: class=fireeye_hx action="detection ioc hit" NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: TRELLIX HX [ExD Hit Found]
description: This rule looks for ExD (Exploit Detection) events generated by Trellix Endpoint Security (HX) logs.
query: class=fireeye_hx action="detection exd hit" NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT HX [Malware Detected: <%= virus %>]
description: Trellix HX Endpoint Security detected malware on this system using the AV engine. This activity was not blocked.

name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT HX [Possible Mimikatz Activity]
description: Mimikatz is a credential dumper capable of obtaining plaintext Windows account logins and passwords. This is associated with mitre att&ck techniques(s): T1003, T1555, T1552, T1550.002, T1547.005
tags: Trellix,Trellix Endpoint,HX,helixhxrule,malware,av,mimkatz,Credential Access,OS Credential Dumping,T1003,Credentials from Password Stores,T1555,Unsecured Credentials,T1552,Defense Evasion,Lateral Movement,Use Alternate Authentication Material,T1550,Pass the Hash,T1550.002,Persistence,Privilege Escalation,Boot or Logon Autostart Execution,T1547,Security Support Provider,T1547.005,md-info

name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT HX [Possible Cobalt Strike Activity]
description: Cobalt Strike is a commercial, full-featured, remote access tool that bills itself as "adversary simulation software designed to execute targeted attacks and emulate the post-exploitation actions of advanced threat actors." This is associated with mitre att&ck techniques(s): T1059.001, T1071.001, T1071.004, T1140
tags: Trellix,HX,Trellix Endpoint,helixhxrule,malware,av,cobalt strike,Command and Control,Application Layer Protocol,T1071,Web Protocols,T1071.001,DNS,T1071.004,Defense Evasion,Deobfuscate/Decode Files or Information,T1140,Execution,Command and Scripting Interpreter,T1059,PowerShell,T1059.001,md-info

name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT HX [Possible Webshell Activity]
description: P.A.S. Webshell is a publicly available multifunctional PHP webshell in use since at least 2016 that provides remote access and execution on target web servers. This is associated with mitre att&ck techniques(s): T1087, T1140, T1005, T1059, T1083, T1105
tags: Trellix,Trellix Endpoint,HX,helixhxrule,malware,av,webshell,Collection,Data from Local System,T1005,Command and Control,Ingress Tool Transfer,T1105,Defense Evasion,Deobfuscate/Decode Files or Information,T1140,Discovery,Account Discovery,T1087,File and Directory Discovery,T1083,Execution,Command and Scripting Interpreter,T1059,md-info

name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT HX [Possible PSImage Activity]
description: Invoke-PSImage takes a PowerShell script and embeds the bytes of the script into the pixels of a PNG image. This is associated with mitre att&ck techniques(s): T1027

name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT HX [Possible Impacket Activity]
description: Impacket is an open source collection of modules written in Python for programmatically constructing and manipulating network protocols. This is associated with mitre att&ck techniques(s): T1047, T1557.001, T1040, T1003
tags: Trellix,Trellix Endpoint,HX,helixhxrule,malware,av,impacket,Collection,Credential Access,Adversary-in-the-Middle,T1557,LLMNR/NBT-NS Poisoning and SMB Relay,T1557.001,OS Credential Dumping,T1003,Discovery,Network Sniffing,T1040,Execution,Windows Management Instrumentation,T1047,md-info

name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT HX [Possible Koadic Activity]
description: Koadic is a Windows post-exploitation framework and penetration testing tool. This is associated with mitre att&ck techniques(s): T1064, T1175, T1218, T1059.003, T1059.005, T1105, T1003.002, T1055.001
tags: Trellix,Trellix Endpoint,HX,helixhxrule,malware,av,koadic,Command and Control,Ingress Tool Transfer,T1105,Credential Access,OS Credential Dumping,T1003,Security Account Manager,T1003.002,Defense Evasion,System Binary Proxy Execution,T1218,Execution,Scripting,T1064,Privilege Escalation,Process Injection,T1055,Dynamic-link Library Injection,T1055.001,Command and Scripting Interpreter,T1059,Windows Command Shell,T1059.003,Visual Basic,T1059.005,Lateral Movement,Component Object Model and Distributed COM,T1175,md-info
mitre_tactics: Command and Control,Credential Access,Defense Evasion,Execution,Privilege Escalation,Lateral Movement

name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT HX [Possible PowerSploit Activity]
description: PowerSploit is an open source, offensive security framework comprised of PowerShell modules and scripts that perform a wide range of tasks related to penetration testing such as code execution, persistence, bypassing anti-virus, recon, and exfiltration. This is associated with mitre att&ck techniques(s): T1059.001, T1087.001, T1547.001, T1547.005, T1543.003, T1005, T1574
tags: Trellix,Trellix Endpoint,HX,helixhxrule,malware,av,powersploit,Collection,Data from Local System,T1005,Defense Evasion,Persistence,Privilege Escalation,Hijack Execution Flow,T1574,Discovery,Account Discovery,T1087,Local Account,T1087.001,Execution,Command and Scripting Interpreter,T1059,PowerShell,T1059.001,Boot or Logon Autostart Execution,T1547,Registry Run Keys / Startup Folder,T1547.001,Security Support Provider,T1547.005,Create or Modify System Process,T1543,Windows Service,T1543.003,md-info
